# dct-item-heading



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

ItemHeading are elements used to describe the contents of a List or an Accordian and should only be
used once at the top of a List or Accordian component.

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                    | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `animateIcons` | `animate-icons` | If true, animate the icon elementsicons in start and end slots | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | ItemHeading is in a disabled state                             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `rotateIcon`   | `rotate-icon`   | * If true, icon is in a rotated state                          | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot            | Description                                |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `"end"`         | Container optional right side icon         |
| `"heading"`     | Container for optional heading content     |
| `"start"`       | Container for the optional left side icon  |
| `"sub-heading"` | Container for optional sub-heading content |
